title: Executor Alias Reason
question: Why is {executorName}’s name different to how it is written in the will or any codicils?
paragraph1: You must explain the reason for the difference, for example, {executorName} changed their name since the will was written, or their middle name was not included.
optionMarriage: They got married or formed a civil partnership
optionDivorce: They got divorced or ended their civil partnership
optionDeedPoll: They changed their name by deed poll
optionPartOfNameNotIncluded: Part of their name was not included

currentNameReason.required: Select a reason why {executorName}’s name is different

otherReason.required: Enter the reason for the change of name
